name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a Fuck x Mark Manson

metadata.name: Subtle Art #1
metadata.description:
As 1 of 1111 pieces of the bestselling book, The Subtle Art of Not Giving a Fuck, this artifact is an idea memorialized to the blockchain and now, owned by you.

>I learned the hard way that if the people in your relationships are selfish and doing hurtful things, it’s likely you are too, you just don’t realize it.  Did my mistakes justify my ex cheating on me? No. But still, I took on the responsibility of never making those same mistakes again, and never overlooking the same signs again, to help guarantee that I will never suffer the same consequences again.

This token also grants you access to an unreleased chapter from the book & Mark Manson’s private web3 community, The Zero Fucks Club. [Verify ownership for access here](https://discord.gg/Ad8Ghs9SaQ).

[High Resolution Image](https://bookcoin.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmZSZAL6F5Yi7zVLpRFd1kqbemLUEaDSgnW4dMVbjggqhF/1.png)

Printed on chain by [BookCoin](http://BookCoin.com).

[Collectors License & Terms of Use](https://help.bookcoin.com/Collection-FAQs/keFW6X286EYG31Su72oWQt/Owning-a-Subtle-Art-NFT/9onKDodMn6Dz7Rp1GEx1uX).
